text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump Good grief
So only 30ish million jobs to go to get to pre #COVID19 employment levels, right?! 
#TrumpOut2020 #TrumpKnewAndDidNothing #TrumpRecession 
#TrumpIsALaughingStock https://t.co/RTT4LHZrDx
